sentences.en: ...where he will observe Thanksgiving with family members.
sentences.cn: …在那里他将与家人一起庆祝感恩节。

sentences.en: ‘Sid looks ill,’ Doherty observed.
sentences.cn: “锡德看上去病了。”多尔蒂说道。

sentences.en: "You will strictly observe your diet: no wine or spirits, very little meat." — "Of course."
sentences.cn: “你要严格控制饮食：禁酒，少吃荤。”——“这个自然。”

sentences.en: All she did observe was that Hurstwood was somewhat different.
sentences.cn: 她真正察觉到的,是赫斯渥有些不同了.

sentences.en: Are there any classes I could observe?
sentences.cn: 有我可以观摩的课吗？

sentences.en: Did he observe on your unusual performance?
sentences.cn: 他对你那不寻常的演出发表评论了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Everyone should observe the law.
sentences.cn: 谁都应该守法.

sentences.en: Imposing speed restrictions is easy, but forcing motorists to observe them is trickier.
sentences.cn: 限制车速容易，但强制司机遵守这些限速规定就难办多了。

sentences.en: Keynes observed that humans fall into two classes.
sentences.cn: 凯恩斯认为人分为两类。

sentences.en: Let's observe a minute's silence in memory of the dead.
sentences.cn: 让我们为死者静默一分钟.

sentences.en: One must observe the rules.
sentences.cn: 我们(任何人)必须遵守规则.

sentences.en: One should not only observe but also help.
sentences.cn: 不但要看,而且要帮.

sentences.en: One student performs the experiment, while his partner observes.
sentences.cn: 一名学生做实验，他的搭档则进行观察。

sentences.en: Predators have been observed to avoid attacking brightly coloured species.
sentences.cn: 据观察发现，食肉动物会避免袭击色彩鲜艳的物种。

sentences.en: Scientists have observed a drop in ozone levels over the Antarctic.
sentences.cn: 科学家已经观察到南极洲上方的臭氧浓度有所下降。

sentences.en: Scientists observe the same dynamics in fluids.
sentences.cn: 科学家们在液体中观察到了同样的驱动力。

sentences.en: So far the ceasefire has been observed by both sides.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止，双方都遵守着停火协定。

sentences.en: The army was observing a ceasefire.
sentences.cn: 军队当时在遵守一项停火协议。

sentences.en: The police have been observing his movements.
sentences.cn: 警方一直在监视他的行动。

sentences.en: The scientists will study the variety of trees and observe which are fruiting.
sentences.cn: 科学家将研究各种树木，并观察哪些会结果实。

sentences.en: We cannot always observe the traditions handed down to us from the past.
sentences.cn: 我们不能永远遵守过去传下来的传统.

sentences.en: We must observe the correct protocol.
sentences.cn: 我们必须遵守应有的礼仪.

sentences.en: We observe a striking shift away from a labor theory among all mainline economists.
sentences.cn: 我们发现在主流经济学家中间出现了一种偏离劳动理论的显著变化。

sentences.en: We'll have to observe the formalities.
sentences.cn: 我们得按手续办事.

words.tran_cn: 显著的；觉察得到的；看得见的
善于观察的；机警的；严格遵守的
观察的；注意的；观察力敏锐的
[物] 可观察量；感觉到的事物
观察者；[天] 观测者；遵守者
观察；遵守；注意到（observe的过去分词形式）

trans.tran_cn: 观察，看到，评论，遵守，庆祝
trans.tran_en: If you observe an important day such as a holiday or anniversary, you do something special in order to honour or celebrate it

trans.tran_cn: 注意到， 察觉到； 观测， 观察； 遵守， 奉行； 说， 评论
